query:
-- Create a default challenge (12 weeks from now)
INSERT INTO challenges (name, description, "startDate", "endDate", type, "isActive")
VALUES (
  'Fitness2Witness Challenge',
  '12-week group fitness and faith challenge',
  '2026-02-10',
  '2026-05-04',
  'custom',
  true
)
ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING
RETURNING id;

-- Create a default group linked to the challenge
INSERT INTO groups (name, "challengeId", "isActive")
VALUES (
  'Pilot Group',
  1,  -- Assuming the challenge ID is 1
  true
)
ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING
RETURNING id;

-- Assign user ID 2 (Quay Merida) to the group
UPDATE users
SET "groupId" = 1  -- Assuming the group ID is 1
WHERE id = 2;

-- Verify the update
SELECT id, name, "groupId", role FROM users WHERE id = 2;
